channel.title: Reinforcement learning on CharlyCst
channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement learning on CharlyCst

item.title: An Interactive Introduction to Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Reinforcement learning (RL) is a branch of machine learning that aim at finding an (hopefully) optimal policy (or behavior) for an agent in a given environment. I find it the most interesting area of machine learning because applications, hide and seek, capture the flag or StarCraft II to quote a few, are really fun to watch, often mind-blowing and sometimes make me think that these virtual agent are truly intelligent.
